content.rendered:
Best nutraceutical merchant services in Los Angeles.

We are a leading credit card processor that specializes in high-risk merchant accounts for nutraceuticals and supplements in Los Angeles. 

Accept Payments Now

We specialize in managing fraudulent charges and high chargeback rates for nutraceuticals and supplements businesses, ensuring financial stability and compliance with industry regulations.

  • High-risk Expertise
  • Chargeback Protection
  • PCI Compliance
Apply Today

Leading nutraceutical credit card processing in Los Angeles.

eCommerce Integrations

Seamless eCommerce integrations with the top online shopping platforms. 

High-risk Solutions

We serve diet, beauty, nootropics, and other supplement merchants. 

Speak to an Expert

Advanced chargeback protection.

Our advanced chargeback protection is tailored for the nutraceutical industry, providing a comprehensive solution to minimize the impact of disputes and fraud. With real-time alerts and effective dispute management, we address chargebacks swiftly and efficiently. This ensures the financial stability of your business and compliance with industry regulations, allowing you to focus on growth and success while we manage the complexities of payment processing. 

Automated recurring billing.

Our automated recurring billing system is ideal for nutraceuticals and supplements, accommodating membership and subscription services seamlessly. This feature streamlines the billing process, ensuring timely and convenient payments for your customers. With the ability to set up flexible recurring plans, you can provide hassle-free access to your products while maintaining a steady revenue stream, enhancing the customer experience in the nutraceutical industry. 

01 02

Step 1

Apply for an account and get approved in as little as 24 hours. 

Step 2

Integrate with your existing store or get started with our tools. 

Step 3

Enjoy low fees and 24/7 customer support with a real person. 

Leading nutraceutical credit card processing in Los Angeles.

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
